steps.description: Generates assets/workflow-animation.gif showing the Purlin agent lifecycle and embeds it in README.md under the '## How It Works' heading.
steps.agent_instructions: Run `python3 dev/generate_workflow_animation.py` from the project root. Confirm exit code 0, that `assets/workflow-animation.gif` was created or updated, and that `README.md` contains exactly one reference to `assets/workflow-animation.gif` under the `## How It Works` heading.
